ygData.subject: Re: Adjusting Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally I use Strength tap, keeps me stronger and no one can say I stole a kill.  Was thinking of our AoE Str spell but last I checked it was broke (Wave of
ygData.messageBody:
Personally I use Strength tap, keeps me stronger and no one can say I stole
a kill. Was thinking of our AoE Str spell but last I checked it was broke
(Wave of Enfeeblement)


<-- Enigma -->
Follower of the Crimson Knights
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Murphy, Kenneth E. [mailto:MurphyK@...]
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 2:36 PM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Adjusting Faction

From: "Murphy, Kenneth E." <MurphyK@...>


>From: "Goblin" <goblin@...>

> So I walk around with my level one Life Tap
>memorized in a spare slot, and just tap everything that people are
fighting.
>(I do an OOC first and occasionally explaining what I am doing, just so
>folks don't think I am kill stealing.) This allows me to hit very high
>numbers of faction very very quickly.
